TextView.android:text: This is the game lookup. To find a game, there are three dropdowns. The first selects the sport, the second the first team, the third the second team (the options for which are the opponents of the first team sorted alphabetically). Each one will only appear as the previous is filled, and the text at the top serves as a prompt.
Once you hit submit, it will prompt you for what type of information you'd like to see in the statwell in regards to the team selected. This can also be set from the tabs that will appear.

A menu for navigation is accessible from clicking on the logo at the top left. Also accessible from the top bar are both a twitter button through which you can search public tweets and/or post a tweet and a facebook button with similar functionality.

At the bottom is a comment thread (not visible here). Before selecting a team, it's a general thread. After selecting a team (hitting submit), it opens a thread unique to that team. This will remain across all season cycles.
